Topic.Title: Run Script First Time a Wearable Object is Worn

Posts.EditableText:

Any advice?  (specifics in the editor requested, as I don't yet know how to code.)

Posts.EditableText:
\> wear it
You put it on.
This message prints once.

\> remove it
You take it off.

\> wear it
You put it on.
